title: (x) PornStar - Candice {David H}
content:
Sure, it is.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052609im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Her name would be ' [Candice](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/candice/)', by Alan Meeks..
